title: OFF-GRID GARDEN WATERING SYSTEM | Tank Set Up

tasks.task: Setting up an off-grid garden watering system using an irrigation ditch and a water tank.
subtasks: Prime the PVC pipes with a primer.
Apply glue to female fittings before male fittings during assembly.
Correct a leaking valve caused by a misaligned pipe fitting.
Fill the 1100-gallon water tank using gravity from the irrigation ditch.
Determine the necessary pressure supply for the garden using a gas-powered pump or solar well pump.
Install drip irrigation and low PSI systems to water the garden.

tasks.task: MAINTASK: Setting up an off-grid garden watering system using an irrigation ditch and a water tank.
